feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.14.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.14.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.14.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.14.1

What's Changed

  • Bump eslint from 9.13.0 to 9.14.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1274
  • Bump globals from 15.11.0 to 15.12.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1278
  • Bump rollup from 4.24.3 to 4.24.4 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1277
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1276
  • Bump @codemirror/legacy-modes from 6.4.1 to 6.4.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1279
  • Bump github.com/swaggest/rest from 0.2.68 to 0.2.69 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1283
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1281
  • Bump golang.org/x/oauth2 from 0.23.0 to 0.24.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1280
  • Bump github.com/golang-jwt/jwt/v4 from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1275
  • Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.30.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1285
  • Bump rollup from 4.24.4 to 4.25.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1284
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1286
  • Bump go.etcd.io/etcd/server/v3 from 3.5.16 to 3.5.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1289
  • Bump go.etcd.io/etcd/etcdctl/v3 from 3.5.16 to 3.5.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1291
  • Bump @codecov/rollup-plugin from 1.2.1 to 1.3.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1294
  • Bump rollup from 4.25.0 to 4.26.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1293
  • Bump codecov/codecov-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1295
  • Bump @eslint/plugin-kit from 0.2.0 to 0.2.3 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1296
  • Bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.5 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1297
  • Bump rollup from 4.26.0 to 4.27.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1300
  • Bump @codecov/rollup-plugin from 1.3.0 to 1.4.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1299
  • Bump eslint from 9.14.0 to 9.15.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1298
  • Bump rollup from 4.27.2 to 4.27.3 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1303
  • Bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1302
  • Bump library/node from 23.1 to 23.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1301
  • Bump github.com/coredns/coredns from 1.11.3 to 1.11.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1292
  • Bump yaml from 2.6.0 to 2.6.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1305
  • DNS: fix cname cross zone by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1306

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.15.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.15.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.15.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.15.0

What's Changed

  • Bump library/node from 23.2 to 23.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1308
  • Bump github.com/coredns/coredns from 1.11.4 to 1.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1307
  • dns: fix apex caching by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1309
  • extconfig: make log_iml work correctly by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1310
  • dns: make blocky config fully customizable by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1311

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.14.1...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.16.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.16.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.16.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.16.0

What's Changed

  • etcd: add etcd role tests by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1313
  • instance: add migration System by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1312
  • api: Configurable permissions by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1314

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.15.1...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.17.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.17.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.17.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.17.0

What's Changed

  • instance: add auto config import on first startup by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1316
  • api: fix socket auth by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1317
  • dhcp: fix scope moving when it shouldn't by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1318
  • api: show cluster version by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0
